FILE
  PsiElement(comment)('/*\nRecursive expressions are left associative.\n\nThe tree will have the form (PLUS (PLUS a b) c)\n*/')
  PsiWhiteSpace('\n')
  ExampleRecursiveExpressionExampleImpl(RECURSIVE_EXPRESSION_EXAMPLE)
    PsiElement(recursive_expression)('recursive_expression')
    PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
    PsiElement({)('{')
    PsiWhiteSpace('\n    ')
    ExampleAddExpressionImpl(ADD_EXPRESSION)
      ExampleAddExpressionImpl(ADD_EXPRESSION)
        ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
          PsiElement(LIDENT)('a')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        PsiElement(+)('+')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
          PsiElement(LIDENT)('b')
      PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
      PsiElement(+)('+')
      PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
      ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
        PsiElement(LIDENT)('c')
    PsiWhiteSpace('\n')
    PsiElement(})('}')
